016package com.fns.grivet.model;
017
018import java.sql.Types;
019import java.util.Arrays;
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.stream.Collectors;
022
023import org.springframework.util.Assert;
024
025/**
026 * An {@code AttributeType} specifies the type of an {@link Attribute} defined in a {@link ClassAttribute}.
027 * It may be declared independent from an {@code Attribute} participating 
028 * in multiple {@code ClassAttribute} instances. Mediates between Java and SQL types. 
029 * 
030 * @author Chris Phillipson
031 */
032public enum AttributeType {
033
034    VARCHAR(0, "varchar", Types.VARCHAR),
035    TEXT(1, "text", Types.LONGVARCHAR),
036    ISO_DATE(2, "iso_date", Types.DATE),
037    ISO_DATETIME(3, "iso_datetime", Types.TIMESTAMP_WITH_TIMEZONE),
038    ISO_INSTANT(4, "iso_instant", Types.TIMESTAMP),
039    INTEGER(5, "int", Types.INTEGER),
040    BIG_INTEGER(6, "bigint", Types.BIGINT),
041    DECIMAL(7, "decimal", Types.DECIMAL),
042    JSON_BLOB(8, "json", Types.LONGVARCHAR),
043    BOOLEAN(9, "boolean", Types.TINYINT);
044
045    /** The id. Internally, uniquely and statically identifies this enum. */
046    private final Integer id;
047
048    /** The intermediate type.  Maps between a Java type and SQL type. */
049    private final String type;
050
051    /** A SQL type. @see Types */
052    private final int sqlType;
053
054    /**
055     * Instantiates a new attribute type.
056     *
057     * @param id
058     *            the id
059     * @param type
060     *            the intermediate type
061     * @param sqlType
062     *            the SQL type
063     */
064    AttributeType(Integer id, String type, int sqlType) {
065        this.id = id;
066        this.type = type;
067        this.sqlType = sqlType;
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Gets the id.
072     *
073     * @return the id
074     */
075    public Integer getId() {
076        return id;
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * Gets the intermediate type.
081     *
082     * @return the intermediate type
083     */
084    public String getType() {
085        return type;
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * Gets the SQL type.
090     *
091     * @return the SQL type; one of {@link Types}
092     */
093    public int getSqlType() {
094        return sqlType;
095    }
096
097    /**
098     * From id.
099     *
100     * @param id
101     *            an identifier
102     * @return the attribute type
103     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when id does not match any internal {@link AttributeType#id}
104     */
105    public static AttributeType fromId(Integer id) {
106        List<AttributeType> attributeTypes = Arrays.stream(AttributeType.values()).filter(o -> o.getId() == id).collect(Collectors.toList());
107        Assert.notEmpty(attributeTypes, "Invalid AttributeType [%s]".formatted(id));
108        return attributeTypes.get(0);
109    }
110
111    /**
112     * To SQL type.
113     *
114     * @param type
115     *            the intermediate type
116     * @return a SQL Type; one of {@link Types}
117     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when type does not match any internal {@link AttributeType#type}
118     */
119    public static int toSqlType(String type) {
120        List<AttributeType> attributeTypes = Arrays.stream(AttributeType.values()).filter(o -> o.getType().equalsIgnoreCase(type)).collect(Collectors.toList());
121        Assert.notEmpty(attributeTypes, "Invalid type [%s]".formatted(type));
122        return attributeTypes.get(0).getSqlType();
123    }
124}
125
